messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Stealing will result in the loss of hands; Allahu akbar.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Ork Base In Space 453, please stand-by.
